title: Online Pedagogical Design for Blended Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific theories and basic concepts of experimental design
context.additional_context: Blended synchronous/asynchronous classroom environments using digital devices. Measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more instructional strategies for effective science knowledge delivery on online platforms
Learners can create lesson materials applying interaction techniques to increase learner engagement in blended environments
Learners can establish project-based assessment systems and provide feedback using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
